articles.title: NMDC hikes lump ore rate by Rs 100 per tonne; Rs 200 for fines
articles.description: The price hike came at a time when steel prices in India are trading at an all-time high. Iron ore is one of the key raw materials used in the manufacturing of steel, and any movement in the prices of the mineral has a direct impact on the rate of steel.
articles.content:
The country's largest iron ore miner NMDC on Friday hiked the prices of lump ore by Rs 100 a tonne and Rs 200 in case of fines with immediate effect.
